thread.title: Night of the living dead? Halloween in the Catacombs offered
thread.title_full: Night of the living dead? Halloween in the Catacombs offered | News24

author: news24.com
title: Night of the living dead? Halloween in the Catacombs offered
text:
Paris - Up to two people will spend one of the year's creepiest nights in one of the world's creepiest places this Halloween: the Catacombs of Paris.
In an unusual marketing ploy, apartment hosting website AirBnB is offering a one-night stay for up to two people in the Catacombs in an online contest.
The "lucky" pair will have a bed, and breakfast is included. Somewhat predictably, amenities do not include a gym, wireless internet or cable TV.
But it's not all doom and gloom: The evening also includes a "culinary experience", private concert and storyteller. "Finally, enjoy dawn with the dead, as you become the only living person ever to wake up in the Paris catacombs," AirBnB says on its website.
